MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the LL32 & LL34 postcode area of Conwy and Penmaenmawr, affecting properties in Fairy Glen Road and surrounding streets. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10PM due to remove a generator and connect the network back to the main supply. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 11:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8PM on 31st March 2021
